activities.name: Build Mech
activities.description: Use the printer to produce a mech that you have a license for.
activities.notes: A labor intensive process that takes considerable time. Printer quality determines mechs traits.

activities.name: Scavange
activities.description: Search the ruined sections of the bunker for salvagable materials.

resources.description: salvaged some resources from the ruins.

facilities.name: Mech Printer (damaged)
facilities.description: A very old printer that still functions, albeit with some quirks.
facilities.notes: Allows the printing of mechs, weapons and systems. All mechs printed with this printer gain 1 Flaw at random.

facilities.name: Materials Reclaimer
facilities.description: An array of machinery used to deconstruct waste materials into component parts for reuse.
facilities.notes: Allows destroyed or damaged mechs, weapons and other machines to be recyclyed for materials.

defenses.name: Local Militia
defenses.description: Local civilians who will take up arms to defend their homes. Untrained and poorly equipped.

defenses.name: Simple Radar
defenses.description: A somewhat aging radar system designed to pick up vehicle sized targets at ranges of roughly 30 km.
defenses.notes: Gives a short notice of approaching threats. Will not detect infantry or small vehicles.

defenses.name: Motion Sensors
defenses.description: A relay of bog-standard motion sensors placed several kilometers out. Prone to false positives from wildlife.

personnel.name: Laura Stahl
personnel.description: A talented mechanical engineer who grew up on New Samona. She has a particular hatred for house Harken.
personnel.notes: Provides the settlement with 2 blocks of construction or production time each downtime.
